EmailTemplate.name: Order Approval Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Approval Required - {!Order__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your approval is required for {!Order__c.Name} for Opportunity {!Order__c.Opportunity__c}. Please submit your approval so that this may be processed. {!Order__c.Account__c} {!Order__c.Name} {Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalSummary__c.Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalId__c}} {!Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalSummary__c.Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalIdId__c} {!Order__c.Status__c} {!Order__c.Id_18_character__c} {!Order__c.Salesperson__c}
